results.title: Oral Metformin Inhibits Choroidal Neovascularization by Modulating the Gut-Retina Axis
results.text_hl: Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Inhibits @<m>DISEASE_Choroidal_Neovascularization</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020256 @@@Choroidal Neovascularization@@@ by Modulating the Gut-Retina Axis

Oral Metformin Inhibits Choroidal Neovascularization by Modulating the Gut-Retina Axis Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci. 2023 Dec 1;64(15):21. PMID: 38108689

results.title: Intravitreal Metformin Protects Against Choroidal Neovascularization and Light-Induced Retinal Degeneration.
results.text_hl: Intravitreal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Protects Against @<m>DISEASE_Choroidal_Neovascularization</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020256 @@@Choroidal Neovascularization@@@ and Light-Induced @DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@Retinal Degeneration@@@.

results.title: Newly-found functions of metformin for the prevention and treatment of age-related macular degeneration.
results.text_hl: Recent studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ can regulate @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ metabolism, inhibit @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, and prohibit retinal cell death and @<m>DISEASE_Choroidal_Neovascularization</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020256 @@@CNV@@@ formation due to various pathological factors.

citations.NLM: Dang KR, Wu T, Hui YN, Du HJ. Newly-found functions of metformin for the prevention and treatment of age-related macular degeneration. Int J Ophthalmol. 2021;14(8):1274-1280. PMID: 34414094
citations.BibTeX: @article{34414094, title={Newly-found functions of metformin for the prevention and treatment of age-related macular degeneration.}, author={Dang KR and Wu T and Hui YN and Du HJ}, journal={Int J Ophthalmol}, volume={14}, number={8}, pages={1274-1280}}

results.title: Metformin and the Development of Age-Related Macular Degeneration.
results.text_hl: ...Importance: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has demonstrated protective effects in systemic diseases, including @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@, and @DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal diseases@@@, such as @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Choroidal_Neovascularization</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020256 @@@choroidal neovascularization@@@.

citations.NLM: Jindal DA, Hanna J, Shaia JK, Markle J, Rachitskaya A, Kaelber DC, Singh RP, Talcott KE. Metformin and the Development of Age-Related Macular Degeneration. JAMA Ophthalmol. 2025 Sep 18;():. PMID: 40965862
